SCTX:
Begin amuletQuarraScript

short button
short messageOn
short reset
short OnPCEquip

;if ( MenuMode == 1 )
;	Return
;endif

if ( OnPCEquip == 0 )
	set reset to 0
endif

if ( reset == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( OnPCEquip == 1 )
	if ( reset == 0 )
		if ( VampClan == 3 )
			if ( PCVampire == 1 )
				Set OnPCEquip to 0
				MessageBox "Would you like to return to Druscashti?" "Yes" "No"
				set messageOn to 1
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( messageOn == 1)

	set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button >= 0 )
		set messageOn to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 0 )
		Player->PositionCell, 2077.101, -785.586, -752, 270, "Druscashti, Upper Level"
		set reset to 1		
	
	elseif ( button == 1 )
		set reset to 1
		return
	endif
endif


End
